getting-started.content: Welcome to ShopHub! This guide will help you get started with our platform.

sections.title: Creating an Account
sections.content: To create an account, click the 'Register' button and fill out the required information.

sections.title: Browsing Products
sections.content: Use our navigation menu to browse different product categories or use the search function.

sections.title: Making Your First Purchase
sections.content: Add items to your cart and proceed to checkout when you're ready to purchase.

faq.question: How long does shipping take?
faq.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, express shipping takes 2-3 business days, and overnight shipping delivers in 1 business day.

faq.question: What is your return policy?
faq.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be in original condition and packaging.

faq.question: Do you ship internationally?
faq.answer: Currently, we only ship within the United States. International shipping may be available in the future.

faq.question: How can I track my order?
faq.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay.
